channel.title: Arduino on Thomas J. Petz, Jr.
channel.description: Recent content in Arduino on Thomas J. Petz, Jr.

item.title: Updates to the NanoBLESensors Project
item.description: I’ve merged in some significant updates to the NanoBLESensors project. Hop over to GitHub to check them out.

item.title: DHT11 Temperature and Humidity Sensor and the Arduino Nano 33 BLE
item.description: I’ve created a new simple Arduino sketch using a variety of Temperature/Humidity sensors. (https://github.com/tjpetz/EnvironmentSensorTests. Of note in this simple example is using the DHT11 sensor with a Nano 33 BLE Sense board.
